RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since Ap ril 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEE JAY vied fort the early lead three wide while in hand, then was given and little more reins on the backstretch, then was given hid que on the turn and drew clear while still in the three path, then drew off leaving the turn and was given a few pops right handed with the riding crop to the sixteenth marker and then was hand ridden late to prove much the best. TRUE SUCCESS was allowed to settle early, shifted out and advanced four wide by the quarter pole, then rallied well for the place award. LINGFIELD PARK was rated three wide early, made a mild bid three wide by the quarter pole, but then was empty in the drive, held show award. RADIEUX vied for the lead on the inside and weakened, missed show award. UNCLE YUDI was settled back early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. COPPERHEAD CREEK was settled on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Radieux
ENTRY.OWNER: Mikelle Farms LLC and Morales Marilyn I
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, weakened, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Yudi
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came 5 wide, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Dee Jay
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 3 wide, bid 3/8, drew clear, drew off stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Copperhead Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lingfield Park
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, mild bid 3 wide 1/4 pole, empty, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: True Success
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/4 pole, rallied for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 70. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAST MINUTE MARIO dueled for the lead three wide, made a three wide bid leaving the quarter pole and shook clear, then maintained a safe margin to the wire to prove best, drviing. KEEPING IT COUNTRY was bumped at the start, tracked the early pace four wide, made a three wide bid on the turn and then finished willingly to the wire but needed more, second best. SPOOKY ONE was bumped at the start, dueled for the lead on the inside and then weakened in the lane. BEAST OR FAMINE chased the early pace five wide, then was three to four wide o0n the turn and had no rally. KAZTHAROS chased the early pace on the inside, then was trying to lug out on the turn, then came four wide into the lane and wasnot a threat while lugging out in the ;lane. EDWARD MADDEN tracked the early pace in between rivals and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Kaztharos
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, trying to lug out turn, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Edward Madden
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Keeping It Country
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, tracked 4 wide, bid 3 wide, willingly, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Spooky One
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, dueled inside, weakened stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Beast Or Famine
ENTRY.OWNER: J A G Racing and Jettany Thoroughbred Corp.
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 5 wide, 4-3 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Last Minute Mario
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, bid 3 wide, shook clear, kept safe, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 75. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SKIMBLE SHANKS was well rated early, made a three wide move on the turn and was clear by the quarter pole, then remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. ORASHI pulled early on the inside on the first turn, then was ridden along on the backstretch, shifted out leaving the five sixteenths and came three wide inton the lane and finished willingly to be clearly second best. LUCKY RUNNING CAT was allowed to settle early four wide, came five wide into the lane while advancing but lacked a late response, held show award. KAZ MUNNINGS was on the inside into the first turn, shifted out and then stalked the pace three wide, then prompted the pace and made a bid between rivals leaving the five sixteenths but weakened. ON THE EDGE set the pace on the inside and weakened after six furlongs.

ENTRY.NAME: Orashi
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled inside early, shift out 5/16, came 3 wide, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Skimble Shanks
ENTRY.OWNER: Rock Bottom Ranch and Warrior's Reward LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, 3 wide move 5/16, drew clear 1/4, clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Running Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide turn, came 5 wide, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Kaz Munnings
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside into first turn, shift 3 wide 7/8, bid between 5/16, faded

ENTRY.NAME: On the Edge
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, weakened 5/16

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 87. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 10 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UNIMPEACHABLE prompted the early pace four wide, made a three wide move on the turn to take over, then drew out in the lane under mild urging. KHAKI JACK stalked the early pace and made a four wide bid with the winner but could not go with that rival while staying on for the place award. CONDITION ONE chased the pace on the inside, eased off the inside and came four wide into then lane, then angled in leaving the furlong marker and was up for the show award. ZILLION was reluctant to load, settled early, four wide on the turn and came six wide into the lane and had no kick, missed show awatrd. MAJOR THOMAS tracked the early pace two wide and in between rivals, then eased out on the turn and came five wide while making a bid, but came up empty the the final furlong. CASH IN A FLASH dueled for the lead three wide and weakened. GET DOWN BROWN dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened. RAPID RESPONSE was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Condition One
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, came 4 wide, angled in 1/8, got show

ENTRY.NAME: Major Thomas
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace between horses, eased out, came 5 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Zillion
ENTRY.COMMENT: reluctant to load, settled, 4 wide turn, came 6 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Rapid Response
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Get Down Brown
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Unimpeachable
ENTRY.OWNER: Pewter Stable and Cumiskey Jeanine M
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace 4 wide, bid 3 wide, drew clear, mild drive

ENTRY.NAME: Cash in a Flash
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Khaki Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 4 wide, bid 4 wide, flattened out, 2nd best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 76. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lb s.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 10 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 10 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSICAL CAT was rated on the outside early, advanced four wide by the quarter pole, continued that biod and wore down the front runners to edge clear late, driving. JUST ADD MOONLIGHT set a pressured pace three wide, then was headed leaving the turn and was passed by the furlong marker but ran on to the wire but was outfinished by the winner while saving the place award late. MORE RANSOM was allowed to settle early, came five wide into the lane and closed the gap late on the outside, missed place award. PLATINUM PROMISE pressed thew early pace and made a inside bid leaving the turn to gain a short lead by the furlong marker but faded late. IN GOOD TROUBLE tracked the pace and was two to three wide on the turn but came up empty in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Promise
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside, bid inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: More Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, came 5 wide upper stretch, closed gap,

ENTRY.NAME: In Good Trouble
ENTRY.OWNER: Abdala III Albert P and The Mirage Ranch
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, 2-3 wide turn, empty stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Just Add Moonlight
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace 3 wide, headed 3/16, outfinished, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Musical Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated outside, bid 4 wide 1/4, wore down rivals, edged clear

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sally Thomas & New Dawn Stable LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 10 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SALTY HEIR was rated between rivals early, made a four wide move on the turn, then continued that bid leaving the turn and edged away in the final furlong to prove best under a drive. THE MAN TO SEE was well rated early, made a three wide bid on the turn to take command then went on even terms with the winner by the furlong marker and could not go with that rival late, second best. COMBATING was void of early speed, advanced on the inside on the turn and came five wide into the lane and was along for the show award. SOUL PROVIDER was away alertly and crossed over to the inside to set the early pace while clear, then was headed by the five sixteenths and gave way. DR GREENTHUMB chased the pace on the inside and stopped. SEE OUT chased the pace four wide and stopped on the turn, pulled up quarter pole, vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Dr Greenthumb
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Salty Heir
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated between horses, bid 4 wide, edged away, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: See Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 4 wide, stopped, pulled up, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: The Man to See
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated, bid 3 wide, clear 1/4, no match late, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Combating
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, inside turn, came 5 wide, along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Soul Provider
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set unchallenged pace inside, headed 5/16, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 40. Maiden Claiming Purse 13600. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HI HEELED WARRIOR stalked the pace two wide and made a two wide bid on the turn to draw clear, then drew off in the lane to prove much the best while being kept to pressure. HAZARD chased the pace and made a bid three wide on the turn but proved to be no match for the winner while clearly second best. KIRRABON was four wide on both turns, reserved early and was along for the show award, bested rest. SUSANAS LUCKYCHARM set the pace from the inside and wakened after six furlongs. RACE N RETURN was settled early on the inside and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Susanas Luckycharm
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, weakened 1/4, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Hi Heeled Warrior
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Race N Return
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle,inside, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Hazard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Kirrabon
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, reserved, came 4 wide, bested rest
